name: ScriptPad
description: Terminal based text editor built entirely using Rust.

name: FortifyWallet
description: Originally built as an implementation part of my final thesis, Fortify wallet is a web-based custodial Hierarchical Deterministic wallet for Bitcoin built specifically for organizational use case.

name: NeatStart
description: A chrome extension built to replace the 'new tab' page inside common chrome browsers

name: Moviz
description: Movie database displaying upcoming and current movies, utilizing the TMDB API.

name: testyourknowledge.com
description: Quiz game based on 10 true or false questions, retrieved from the Open Trivia Database.

name: RockPaperScissors
description: Rock paper scissors game built in React.
